info.title: Outbox AI API
info.description: API for managing AI agents (chatbots and voicebots) on the Outbox platform

get.description: Retrieve a list of agents for the authenticated user's company with optional filtering, searching, and pagination

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. If omitted, returns all results unpaginated. Page size is 10 items.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by agent type

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter agents by name (case-insensitive partial match)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Duplicate an existing agent to a specified company (can be the same or different company)

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent to duplicate

schema.description: The ID of the newly duplicated agent

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions (requires level 3 on both source and destination companies)

get.description: Retrieve agent details including configuration, tools, files, and platform integrations

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent to retrieve

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent to update

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid data or failed to retrieve assistant

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

delete.description: Delete an agent and unassign any associated phone numbers

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent to delete

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Create a new agent (chatbot or voicebot)

schema.description: The ID of the newly created agent

400.description: Bad Request - Agent limit reached or failed to create assistant

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve the text content of an agent's file (supports PDF, DOCX, and text files)

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the file to retrieve

schema.description: Plain text content of the file

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error processing file

patch.description: Update the text content of an existing file

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the file to update

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

delete.description: Delete a file from an agent and remove it from the knowledge base

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the file to delete

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Upload a file to an agent (file upload, text content, or web scraping)

requestBody.description: File upload options - text content, file upload, or URLs for web scraping

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid file or missing required fields

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Create or update a platform integration for a chatbot agent (e.g., Instagram, Facebook)

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent

400.description: Bad Request - Missing required fields or GHL integration not found

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve a list of all tools for an agent (simplified view)

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Create or update a tool for an agent

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the agent

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

delete.description: Delete a tool from an agent

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Send a message to a chatbot agent and receive a response (for chatbot agents only)

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the chatbot agent

400.description: Bad Request - Missing required fields or invalid agent type

post.description: Initiate an outbound phone call with a voicebot agent (for voicebot agents only)

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The ID of the voicebot agent

201.description: Call queued for later (no concurrent lanes available or scheduled)

400.description: Bad Request - Missing phone_number, invalid scheduled_at format, insufficient wallet balance, or failed to create contact

get.description: Retrieve a list of all module instances for the authenticated user's company

200.description: List of module instances retrieved successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of contacts with filtering and sorting options

parameters.name: X-User-Timezone
parameters.description: User's timezone for timestamp formatting (defaults to UTC)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Page size is 20 items.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter contacts by name, email, or phone (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter contacts by tags

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Sort direction

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific contact including recent activity

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact to delete

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of conversations (contacts with message/call activity)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Page size is 10 items.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter conversations by contact name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: unread_only
parameters.description: If 'true', only return conversations with unread messages or unopened calls

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve unified conversation history for a contact (messages, calls, tool calls, and interrupts)

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact

parameters.name: X-User-Timezone
parameters.description: User's timezone for timestamp formatting (defaults to UTC)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Page size is 10 items.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of voicebot call logs with filtering options

parameters.name: X-User-Timezone
parameters.description: User's timezone for timestamp formatting

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Page size is 10 items.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter by contact name, phone number, or thread ID

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by call status

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: Filter by agent ID

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Filter by call direction

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime string for date range start

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime string for date range end

parameters.name: min_score
parameters.description: Minimum score filter (0-100)

parameters.name: max_score
parameters.description: Maximum score filter (0-100)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: search

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by call status

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Filter by call direction

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime string for date range start

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime string for date range end

parameters.name: min_score
parameters.description: Minimum score filter (0-100)

parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime for single month (default: current month)

parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime for date range start

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 datetime for date range end

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

model.description: AI model used by the agent

first_message.description: Initial message sent by the agent

description.description: Description that generates prompt from instructions

total.description: Total count of agents matching filters

company_id.description: ID of the company where the agent should be duplicated

text.description: New text content for the file

name.description: Name of the file (required when using text option)

urls.description: Newline-separated URLs for web scraping (for web scraping option)

integration_id.description: ID of the integration to update
ID of the integration to delete

tool_id.description: ID of the tool to delete

message.description: The message to send to the chatbot

thread_id.description: Thread ID for continuing an existing conversation

platform.description: Platform where the message originated (e.g., sms, email, instagram, facebook)

thread_message_id.description: ID of the message, null if no message created

phone_number.description: Phone number to call (E.164 format recommended)

full_name.description: Full name of the person being called

agent_number.description: Phone number to call from (must be assigned to the agent)

context.description: Custom variables for the call that can be used in prompts with {{variable}} placeholders

first_message.description: Override the agent's default first message

scheduled_at.description: ISO-8601 datetime string for scheduling the call (will be converted to UTC)

status.description: Status based on most recent module run

schedule.description: Crontab schedule details, null if not scheduled

logs.description: Logs from the 3 most recent module runs

timestamp.description: Formatted: DD/MM/YYYY  HH:MM AM/PM in user's timezone

module_id.description: ID of the module to create an instance from

instance_name.description: Name for the instance (defaults to module name if not provided)

day_of_week.description: Day of week in crontab format

day_of_month.description: Day of month in crontab format

day_of_week.description: Day of week in crontab format

day_of_month.description: Day of month in crontab format

name.description: Name for the duplicated module instance

company_id.description: ID of the company where the module instance should be duplicated

last_activity.description: Last activity timestamp in user timezone

recent_activity.description: 3 most recent agent threads (conversations or calls)

tags.description: Tags to associate with the contact
Tags to associate with the contact

last_message.description: Message text or call description with duration (e.g., 'Incoming Call (2:45)')

unread_count.description: Count of unread messages + unopened calls

messages.description: Unified conversation history with messages, calls, tool calls, and interrupts

timestamp.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in user timezone

created_at.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in user timezone

last_activity.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in user timezone

timestamp.description: Relative time (e.g., '5 minutes ago') if within 7 days, otherwise formatted date DD/MM/YYYY

created_at.description: Format: DD/MM/YYYY  HH:MMam/pm in user timezone

timestamp.description: Format: DD/MM/YYYY  HH:MMam/pm in user timezone

messages.description: Unified messages from thread messages, tool calls, and interrupts

timestamp.description: Format: DD/MM/YYYY  HH:MMam/pm in user timezone
Format: DD/MM/YYYY  HH:MMam/pm in user timezone
Format: DD/MM/YYYY  HH:MMam/pm in user timezone

logo.description: Logo URL, null if not set

api_key.description: Setting this field (any value) triggers API key regeneration
Setting this field (any value) triggers API key regeneration

agency_id.description: ID of the agency to transfer ownership to

company_name.description: Name for the new duplicated company

agency_id.description: ID of the agency for the new company

email.description: Email address of the user to invite

invite_id.description: ID of the invitation to cancel

staff_id.description: ID of the staff member to update
ID of the staff member to remove

integration.description: True if company has telephony integration

agent.description: Agent ID or null to unassign

logo.description: Logo URL, null if not set

Setting this field (any value) triggers API key regeneration
